variants.Description in input context: c.872G>A (p.G291D) causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000546.5:c.872G>A caused a decrease in protein localization within the nucleus.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA with Tukey's post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Intense and uniform protein localization within the nucleus.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Decreased or non-uniform protein localization within the nucleus.
